00010 /**
00011  * A component for object oriented session handling using client-side cookies. dont forget: cookies are sent on any request!
00012  * @author mnt@codeninka.de
00013  * @package kata
00014  * @ignore
00015  */
00016 class SessionComponent
00017 {
00018              /**
00019               * placeholder for controller that owns this component
00020               * @var object
00021               */
00022              public $controller = false;
00023 
00024              /**
00025               * array of strings of component-names this component needs to function. null or false if none.
00026               * @var array
00027               */
00028              public $components = array();
00029 
00030              /**
00031               * path that we use when we set the cookie
00032               * @var string
00033               */
00034 
00035              private $path;
00036              /**
00037               * useragent that we use when we set/check a session-cookie
00038               * @var string
00039               */
00040              private $userAgent=null;
00041 
00042              /**
00043               * time that we use when we check a session cookie
00044               * @var int
00045               */
00046              private $time=0;
00047 
00048              /**
00049               * time after that the session expires (normally time+SESSION_TIMEOUT, as set in config/core.php)
00050               * @var int
00051               */
00052              private $sessionTime=0;
00053 
00054              /**
00055               * perform needed initialization and cache the controller that called us
00056               */
00057              public function startup(&$controller)
00058              {
00059                           $this->controller=$controller;
00060 
00061                           if (SESSION_START) {
00062 
00063                                        if (empty($this->controller->basePath)) {
00064                                                     $this->path = '/';
00065                                        } else {
00066                                                     $this->path = $this->controller->basePath;
00067                                        }
00068 
00069                                        $this->time=time();
00070                                        if (SESSION_TIMEOUT>0) {
00071                                                     $this->sessionTime=$this->time+SESSION_TIMEOUT;
00072                                        } else {
00073                                                     $this->sessionTime=0;
00074                                        }
00075 
00076                                        if (env('HTTP_USER_AGENT') != null) {
00077                                                     $this->userAgent = md5(env('HTTP_USER_AGENT') . $this->getIp(). SESSION_STRING);
00078                                        } else {
00079                                                     $this->userAgent = md5($this->getIp().SESSION_STRING);
00080                                        }
00081 
00082                                        try {
00083                                                     $this->initSession();
00084                                                     $this->checkValid();
00085                                        } catch (Exception $e) {
00086                                                     setcookie(SESSION_COOKIE,false);
00087                                                     $this->initSession();
00088                                                     $this->checkvalid();
00089                                        }
00090                           }
00091              }
00092 
00093              /**
00094               * default constructor. initializes some variables needed to construct a session
00095               * and tries to start/continue a session, throws exception if that fails
00096               */
00097              function __construct () {
00098              }
00099 
00100              /**
00101               * setting some ini-parameters and starting the actual session
00102               */
00103              private function initSession() {
00104                           header('P3P: CP="NOI ADM DEV PSAi COM NAV OUR OTRo STP IND DEM"');
00105              }
00106 
00107              /**
00108               * check if the session expired, or something suspicious happend
00109               */
00110              private function checkValid() {
00111                           if ($this->read('Config')) {
00112                                        if ($this->userAgent == $this->read('Config.userAgent') && (($this->read('Config.time')==0)||($this->time <= $this->read('Config.time')))) {
00113                                                     $this->write('Config.time', $this->sessionTime);
00114                                        } else {
00115                                                     throw new Exception('Session Highjacking detected');
00116                                        }
00117                           } else {
00118                                        srand ((double)microtime() * 1000000);
00119                                        $this->writeArray(array(
00120                         'Config' => 1,
00121                         'Config.userAgent' => $this->userAgent,
00122                         'Config.time' => $this->sessionTime,
00123                         'Config.rand' => rand()
00124                                        ));
00125                           }
00126              }
00127 
00128              private function calculateHash() {
00129                           return md5(serialize($this->sessionData).SESSION_STRING);
00130              }
00131 
00132              private $sessionData=array();
00133              private $isSessionDecoded=false;
00134              private function decodeSession() {
00135                           if ($this->isSessionDecoded) {
00136                                        return;
00137                           }
00138 
00139                           $s = is($_COOKIE[SESSION_COOKIE],'');
00140                           if ($s != '') {
00141                                        $data = base64_decode(urldecode($s));
00142                                        if (false === $data) {
00143                                                     throw new Exception('Session: cant base64decode data');
00144                                        }
00145 
00146                                        $data = gzinflate($data);
00147                                        if (false === $data) {
00148                                                     throw new Exception('Session: cant uncompress data');
00149                                        }
00150 
00151                                        $this->sessionData = unserialize($data);
00152                                        if (false === $this->sessionData) {
00153                                                     throw new Exception('Session: cant unserialize data');
00154                                        }
00155 
00156                                        $hash = is($this->sessionData['Config.hash'],'');
00157                                        unset($this->sessionData['Config.hash']);
00158                                        if ($hash != $this->calculateHash()) {
00159                                                     throw new Exception('Session: hash mismatch (user tampering?)');
00160                                        }
00161                           }
00162                           $this->isSessionDecoded = true;
00163              }
00164 
00165              private function encodeSession() {
00166                           $this->sessionData['Config.hash'] = $this->calculateHash();
00167                           $data = urlencode(base64_encode(gzdeflate(serialize($this->sessionData))));
00168                           unset($this->sessionData['Config.hash']);
00169                           setcookie(SESSION_COOKIE,$data,time()+SESSION_TIMEOUT,'/');
00170              }
00171 
00172              /**
00173               * read value(s) from the session container.
00174               * returns all currently set values if called with null
00175               * returns null when nothing could be found under the name you gave
00176               * @param string $name name under which the value(s) are to find
00177               */
00178              public function read($name = null) {
00179                           $this->decodeSession();
00180 
00181                           if (is_null($name)) {
00182                                        return $this->sessionData;
00183                           }
00184 
00185                           if (empty($name)) {
00186                                        return false;
00187                           }
00188 
00189                           if (isset($this->sessionData[$name]) && !is_null($this->sessionData[$name])) {
00190                                        return $this->sessionData[$name];
00191                           }
00192                           return null;
00193              }
00194 
00195              /**
00196               * write mixed values to the session-component.
00197               * @param string $name identifier, may contain alphanumeric characters or .-_
00198               * @param mixed $value values to store
00199               */
00200              public function write($name, $value) {
00201                           $var = $this->validateKeyName($name);
00202 
00203                           if (empty($var)) {
00204                                        return false;
00205                           }
00206 
00207                           $this->sessionData[$name]=$value;
00208                           $this->encodeSession();
00209              }
00210 
00211              /**
00212               * write multiple key value arrays to session-component
00213               * @param $arr array with key-value pairs
00214               */
00215              public function writeArray($arr) {
00216                           foreach ($arr as $k=>$v) {
00217                                        $k = $this->validateKeyName($k);
00218                                        $this->sessionData[$k]=$v;
00219                           }
00220                           $this->encodeSession();
00221              }
00222 
00223              /**
00224               * delete values stored under given name from the session-container
00225               * @param string $name identifier
00226               */
00227              public function delete($name) {
00228                           if (!empty($name)) {
00229                                        unset($this->sessionData[$name]);
00230                           }
00231                           $this->encodeSession();
00232              }
00233 
00234              /**
00235               * checks if you used a valid string  as identifier
00236               * @param string $name may contain a-z, A-Z, 0-9, ._-
00237               */
00238              private function validateKeyName($name) {
00239                           if (is_string($name) && preg_match("/^[0-9a-zA-Z._-]+$/", $name)) {
00240                                        return $name;
00241                           }
00242                           throw new exception("'$name' is not a valid session string identifier");
00243                           return false;
00244              }
00245 
00246              /**
00247               * try to do an educated guess about the users real ip, even if user is behind proxies
00248               */
00249              public function getIp() {
00250                           $it = getUtil('Ip');
00251                           return $it->getIp();
00252              }
00253 
00254              /**
00255               * destroy any current session and all variables stored in the session-container with it
00256               */
00257              public function destroy() {
00258                           session_destroy();
00259              }
00260 }
